entry.title: OpenThread Border Router with Raspberry Pi

link.title: OpenThread Border Router with Raspberry Pi

entry.content:
OpenThread

OpenThread is an opensource implementation of the thread — an IPv6-based networking protocol using the IEEE 802.15.4 physical layer (zigbee). Its can be implemented on many simple devices and development tools from popular manufacturers like nordic and stm.
